rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Modern lobby with minimalist design and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact yet functional bathroom for guests.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Small kitchen space adjoining the dining area and living room.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open plan dining area with large windows to view garden.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with modern furnishings and Vastu-aligned south-east orientation for prosperity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with attached walk-in closet.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Quiet study room positioned in the north-east to harness energy and focus.

openings.description: Modern entrance with glass doors leading directly to the living area.
Dual-car garage door opening, allowing easy access to parked vehicles.
Large windows offering panoramic views of the expansive garden.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (First Floor)
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with en-suite bathroom and Vastu-aligned north-west orientation to promote calm.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable secondary bedroom for family use.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with ample natural light and south-east orientation.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: Open balcony adjacent to living areas for relaxation.

openings.description: Door leading from the third bedroom to a private veranda overlooking the garden.
Staircase opening providing access to the rooftop terrace designed for gatherings and relaxation.
